overview:
Scott Weingold is a successful entrepreneur whose expertise lies in the financial services and personal services sectors. He is co-founder of College Planning Network, LLC - the nation’s largest college admissions and financial aid advisory firm. Through College Planning Network, LLC, Scott also publishes one of the internet’s most popular free educational resource sites, College Made Simple.com.

Scott was ranked the #1 “College Financial Aid Expert Worth Knowing About” in the entire country by CollegeStats.org. He was also ranked one of the top 20 business people “on the rise” both by Crain’s Cleveland Business and by CJN Magazine. He is a professional speaker who has addressed thousands of audiences online and offline across the US and his free online video workshop is one of the most popular in the entire college funding space.
